title: "How does magnetism affect the body and mind in relation to illness and healing?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens, the text delves into the importance of the psyche and soul in magnetotherapy. The author emphasizes that the activity and state of the soul in a sick person play a significant role in the course of their illness and the methods used to treat it. The text also discusses the principle morbide and the corpuscles of Pacini, which can impact the blood's circulation. The text concludes with information on how to conduct general passes and the importance of observing the person's character and posture in phrenology and neurology.
content: What is clear return of blood to notice excellent? Whether it is more magnetic, or more electrically. FIN RAJOUT 8 ==========================================================================================
last_phrase: In conclusion, when it comes to determining the clear return of blood, it is important to consider both magnetic and electrical properties.
